This technique creates a stream of fire that can be manipulated into several forms (so far, rings of fire that run on the ground or a circle of fire flying through the air) before striking the target. It can also be used in combination with [[Wind Release: Divine Wind]] to create a tornado of flames, or with [[Wind Release: Divine Mountain Wind]] to release a massive inferno, the latter which is made even more powerful when used in an enclosed space created by [[Earth Release: Earth Corridor]].
